mapper.select: SELECT login_info_table.uId, login_info_table.uAccount, login_info_table.uPassword, login_info_table.uName, login_info_table.organization_code, login_info_table.organization_name, login_info_table.uStatus, login_info_table.headerImageUrl FROM login_info_table WHERE login_info_table.uAccount = #{account};

SELECT DISTINCT login_info_table.uAccount, login_info_table.uName, login_info_table.organization_code, login_info_table.organization_name, authority_table.authority_type FROM login_info_table INNER JOIN user_authority_table ON user_authority_table.uAccount = login_info_table.uAccount INNER JOIN authority_table ON authority_table.authority_code = user_authority_table.authority_code; -- WHERE -- authority_table.authority_type !='管理员';
